Package xml.spreadsheet.style

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alignment
    Defines the font alignment attributes to use in this style.
    Border
    Defines a single border within this style's Borders collection.
    Borders
    Defines the border properties for cells referencing this style.
    Font
    Defines the font attributes to use in this style.
    Interior
    Defines the fill properties to use in this style.
    NumberFormat
    Defines the number format that should be in cells referencing this style.
    Protection
    Defines the protection properties that should be used in cells referencing this style.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Alignment.HorizontalAlignment  
    Alignment.VerticalAlignment  
    Border.BorderPosition
    Position of the border
    Border.BorderWeight
    Predefined border weights
    Border.LineStyle
    Line style.
    Font.FontFamily
    Win-32 font family
    Font.Underline
    Underline state of a font
    Font.VerticalAlignment
    Vertical alignment of a font
    NumberFormat.Format
    Predefined number formats
